RT @RepValDemings We just passed The Heroes Act. Here’s the takeaway:

@HouseDemocrats are going to do anything we possibly can to help families and small businesses survive this crisis. Senate Republicans think no additional help is necessary.

Millions of people are struggling to pay rent and put food on the table. They shouldn't have to worry about paying for medical treatment if they get sick.

I'm proud to introduce a bill today with @SenSanders to eliminate all out-of-pocket health costs during the pandemic.

Whenever one of our brave first responders makes the ultimate sacrifice, the least we can do is ensure their families are taken care of. I'm proud to have worked with a bipartisan coalition to quickly pass this legislation which will do exactly that. https://twitter.com/IAFFLeg/status/1261043072051359746 QT @IAFFLeg Presumptive benefits for #firefighters who die from COVID19 are one step closer to becoming law - S. 3607 passes the U.S. Senate unanimously.
